mapper.insert: insert into GoodsCart (cart_id, userId, product_id, amount) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{userId}, #{product_id}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select cart_id, g.product_id, c.userId, name, product_name, amount, price, (price*amount) money from MEMBERS m, GoodsCart c, GOODS g where m.id=c.userId and c.product_id=g.product_id and c.userId=#{userId} order by cart_id
